website_summaries.verdict: With a 1950s look, this full-size American Girl doll has a fun outfit and story that kids will love.
pros: Comes with a cute 1950s outfit and haircut
Hair that's long enough to style
cons: Occasional reports of strands of doll's hair falling out, even with careful play

customer_reviews.title: I love that I'm able to order American girl dolls on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that I'm able to order American girl dolls on amazon now! Free two day shipping was a major plus. I love American girl dolls and Maryellen did not disappoint! Her story like all ag dolls is a wonderful one for young girls. The doll itself is well made and just beautiful. The box and the doll came in perfect condition. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LCFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: a doll that will last a lifetime if cared for.
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter should be writing this......I gave it overall rating 5 because she really went wild over it. value for $ ?, I didn't comparison shop. I heard she wanted one of these, so what is a grandfather for anyway. Book readability another ??? I haven't asked about that. But she isa pretty smart 9 year old. May consider another one for Christmas. If someone likes dolls, I recommend one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Maryellen is such an adorable doll, starting with her 50s inspired outfit made of fine durable materials. She has hazel eyes and very thick ,shiny strawberry blonde hair with cute baby bangs. She has a sweet face on which her head moves from left to right and vinyl arms and legs that move in various positions. She also has a soft stuffed body that is huggable and soft. She has so many other adorable fashions and accessories in her collection as well.She is well worth the price. Lastly she comes with a book about her life for you to read as all the historical American Girl dolls do.
customer_reviews.author: Slasher Diva

customer_reviews.title: Zip tie but glad no permapanties
customer_reviews.text: Came with a zip tie neck rather than strings- but glad she did NOT come with the permanent underwear (aka permapanties). I would've returned if she had them. Beautiful doll.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: on Christmas morning I didn't give the money a thought as I witnessed the happiness of my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time making this purchase for my granddaughter. These dolls are costly. However, on Christmas morning I didn't give the money a thought as I witnessed the happiness of my granddaughter. This doll is well made and beautiful. The only reason I did not give her 5 stars is because she has a wacky thing going on with her bangs. Not a big deal but 5 stars would be a perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for Christmas, to my granddaughter from me this year. She's going to love it. Maryellen is beautiful. She does come with removable underwear. I bought a few outfits for her on Amazon here. Her hands, legs and head moves. Soft body and huggable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Best Grandma Award!!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter asked for this doll, and no other doll would do. She was so excited when she unwrapped Maryellen on Christmas Eve, that she was hugging the box!!!! Her mom told me she had Maryellen with her the next morning when she opened the rest of her gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Velma from Shipping

customer_reviews.title: Great Dolls.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved her American Girl Dolls. They are extremely well made. Every little girl should have the opportunity.

customer_reviews.title: Maryellen is so beautiful❤️
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES her Maryellen doll that santa brought for her. She already has the itty bitty baby, 2 sets of the twins, all the wellie wishers, kisten, Molly, saige, grace, and Samantha, and a few truly me dolls. Maryellen is her new FAVORITE! This doll is beautiful and as a redhead I must say a must have for all redhead little girls❤️

customer_reviews.title: Defective wig
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grand daughter for Christmas. 8 months later her wig is coming apart. (she is very well cared for). The only solution amazon gave me was to take her to the AG store. The store confirmed it is defective and has to send her away for four weeks to be repaired. Not a great situation for a little girl in love with her doll. I feel Amazon should replace her. . .

customer_reviews.title: I do like that a book was included
customer_reviews.text: This is the first American Girl doll for the last of three granddaughters. I also included the AGD hair brush to keep the hair neat. I do like that a book was included. As with the other two, this granddaughter loves the doll. Her mom told me that she wants to take it with her everywhere. With the AME books based on the many historical times, many young girls become excited about reading and our country's growth as a nation. Wouldn't it be nice if the dolls were about half the price (the company would still make an enormous profit) so that more parents/grandparents could afford a AMG doll to continue their grand/daughter's interest in reading/ learning.

Congratulations to American Girl's marketing department, which has successfully convinced the 6-10 year old girls of America that this Made-In-China chunk of plastic is somehow better than all other Made-In-China chunks of plastic, to the tune of 3-4 times the actual value of this particular chunk of plastic.

product_meta.title: American Girl Maryellen Doll and Book
product_meta.description:
Imaginative Maryellen Larkin has hazel eyes that open and close, and her long strawberry-blond hair is worn in a high ponytail with sideswept bangs. She comes in an authentic 1950s outfit: 

 * A striped dress with a sweetheart neckline, tailored bows, and a full skirt
 * An aqua lacy-knit shrug monogrammed with her initial Black Mary Jane shoes
 * White underwear
 * An aqua ribbon bow on a ponytail holder for her hair



The 18" Maryellen doll has a huggable cloth body, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. She comes with The One and Only: A Maryellen Classic 1 book.

Winner of the 2015 National Parenting Publications (NAPPA) Silver Award.
feature_bullets: Posable limbs, and hair that can be brushed and styled
Read all about her adventures in her paperback novel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
